description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. www.yyrgames.com - In this unique, action-packed experience, defeat the terrorists and storm their desert base using the most advanced Ferret Weapons Technology...all while swinging from a helicopter in style! A donation will be made for each copy sold; for more info, please visit www.yyrgames.com/bft.
